products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion ASC Purple
products.metadescription: Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc purple available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Infusion asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Grid Mulberry
products.metadescription: Perfect fit pleated blind grid mulberry available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Grid perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. Grid is standard shading and is ideal for filtering the light.

products.title: Purple Sunset PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: This deep and delightful purple sunset blind will give your conservatory some real vibrancy and life. It has a glossy finish to the robust aluminium slats that will ensure a bold and magnificent look.
